channel.title: Can scar read a specified line from a text file?
channel.description:
Can scar read a specified line from a text file? e.g.: mystring:=linefromfile('C:/',textfile.txt,10)
So mystring := the line 10 from C:/textfile.txt?

item.source: Can scar read a specified line from a text file?

item.title: Can scar read a specified line from a text file?
item.dc:creator: @Ron Ron
item.description:
@Ron wrote:

lol it doesn’t need to do that though. You can get the information very simply using code.

Look at this procedure GetInfoFromFile(Location : String);
You can copy and paste this into your code, and then if you wanted to get information from any text file, just put in GetInfoFromFile(‘c:\Location of file.txt’); to get info from a file. It’s very easy.

Var
  OutFile, Length2 : Integer;
  Info2, Info3 : String;

Procedure GetInfoFromFile(Location : String);
Begin
  // Sets OutFile to Create a file and if it creates it successfully it returns
  // a file number. False because this file isn't being shared by any app.
  OutFile := OpenFile(Location, False);
  // Saves the Length of whatever's in your Info variable to the variable
  // Length2.
  Length2 := Length(Info2);
  // Read the File, and save the file's info in the variable Info3, then
  // return the exact number of characters it contains using Length2.
  ReadFileString(OutFile, Info3, Length2);
  // Close the file OutFile.
  CloseFile(OutFile);
  // Show the message.
  WriteLn('Your message contained: ');
  WriteLn('  '+Info3);
End;

~Ron

Read full topic

item.title: Can scar read a specified line from a text file?
item.dc:creator: @Boreas Boreas
item.description:
@Boreas wrote:

Are you creating the textfile? Because if you are, there’s sort of a way around it. I haven’t tested this yet, but in theory it should work. If you’re writing the textfile, make it an include and put in constants like mystring. Then in the script that does the ‘reading’ just include the textfile and use the constants. If you’re not creating the textfile,

function ReadFileString(FileNum: Integer; var s: string; Length: Integer): Boolean; - reads Length number of bytes from file into string s.

may work. I found it by searching for file functions in the F1 scar manual.

As for reading a specified line; I don’t know.

Read full topic
